name: The Ice Storm Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: In which state is 'The Ice Storm' mostly set?
questions.explanation:
Connecticut.

	It is set in New Canaan, Connecticut with one episode in New York.

questions.text: What event provides the backdrop to 'The Ice Storm'?
questions.explanation:
Watergate.

	Watergate - symbolic of the breakdown of conventional morality.

questions.text: For what event does Paul Hood come home at the start of the film?
questions.explanation:
Thanksgiving.

	Paul Hood (Toby Maguire) comes home for {Thanksgiving;} his two train journeys home frame the film.

questions.text: Where does Wendy Hood go to meet up with Mikey Carver?
questions.explanation:
Swimming pool.

	Wendy (Christina Ricci) and Mikey meet at the disused swimming pool in the woods.

questions.text: What of her daughter Wendy's activities does Elena Hood envy?
questions.explanation:
Cycling.

	Cycling - Elena (Joan Allen) envies her daughter's freedom.

questions.text: What musical instrument does Wendy Hood play?
questions.explanation:
Trombone.

	She plays the trombone. Sandy Carver plays the triangle.

questions.text: What does Sandy Carver like to do to his toys?
questions.explanation:
Blow them up.

	He blew up several toy planes before his mother Janey Carver (Sigourney Weaver) stopped him.

questions.text: What misdemeanour do both Elena and Wendy Hood commit?
questions.explanation:
Shoplifting.

	They both steal from the town Pharmacy - Elena gets caught.

questions.text: What sort of party builds up to the climax of the film?
questions.explanation:
Key party.

	It's a key party, where couples are encouraged to swap partners. It highlights existing tensions and exposes Ben Hood (Kevin Kline)'s affair with Janey Carver.

Ang Lee.

	Although the film is very American in setting, the final scenes have an oriental quality in their silence and emotional impact.
